name: Finance & Banking
description: Prompts tailored for finance professionals, accountants, and banking specialists in New Zealand

prompts.title: Financial Report Analysis
prompts.content:
Analyse the financial performance of [Company Name] based on the following data:

Revenue: [Revenue Figures]
Expenses: [Expense Breakdown]
Profit Margin: [Margin Percentage]
Year-over-Year Growth: [Growth Rate]

Reporting Period: [Period]
Industry: [Industry Sector]
NZ Market Context: [Relevant NZ Market Conditions]

Provide:
1. Key financial metrics analysis
2. Trend identification
3. Comparison to NZ industry benchmarks
4. Areas of concern
5. Recommendations for improvement
6. Forecast considerations

prompts.title: Investment Portfolio Review
prompts.content:
Conduct a comprehensive portfolio review for [Client Name/Type].

Portfolio Value: [Total Value]
Risk Profile: [Conservative/Balanced/Growth/Aggressive]
Investment Horizon: [Timeframe]

Current Allocation:
[List Asset Classes and Percentages]

Performance Period: [Period]
Benchmark: [Relevant Benchmark]

NZ-Specific Considerations:
- PIE tax implications
- KiwiSaver alignment (if applicable)
- NZ dollar exposure

Provide:
1. Performance analysis vs benchmark
2. Risk assessment
3. Rebalancing recommendations
4. Tax efficiency opportunities
5. Forward outlook

prompts.title: GST Return Preparation Checklist
prompts.content:
Generate a GST return preparation checklist for [Business Name].

Business Type: [Business Type]
GST Filing Period: [Period - Monthly/Two-monthly/Six-monthly]
Accounting Basis: [Invoice/Payments/Hybrid]

Revenue Sources:
[List Revenue Types]

Expense Categories:
[List Major Expense Categories]

Special Considerations:
[Any Special GST Treatments]

Create a comprehensive checklist including:
1. Documentation required
2. Reconciliation steps
3. Common adjustments
4. IRD compliance requirements
5. Filing deadlines and penalties
6. Record-keeping requirements

prompts.title: Cash Flow Forecast Model
prompts.content:
Create a cash flow forecast for [Company Name] for the next [Timeframe].

Current Cash Position: [Amount]
Monthly Revenue Range: [Range]
Fixed Monthly Costs: [List Costs]
Variable Costs: [List Variable Costs]

Seasonal Factors:
[Describe Seasonality]

Planned Capital Expenditure:
[List CapEx]

Debt Obligations:
[List Debt Payments]

NZ Economic Factors:
- Interest rate environment
- Exchange rate considerations
- Industry-specific NZ trends

Generate:
1. Monthly cash flow projections
2. Best/worst case scenarios
3. Key assumptions documented
4. Warning triggers and thresholds
5. Funding requirement analysis

prompts.title: Credit Risk Assessment
prompts.content:
Perform a credit risk assessment for [Applicant/Company Name].

Loan Amount Requested: [Amount]
Purpose: [Loan Purpose]
Term: [Loan Term]

Financial Information:
- Annual Revenue: [Revenue]
- EBITDA: [EBITDA]
- Existing Debt: [Debt Levels]
- Assets: [Asset Summary]

Credit History:
[Summary of Credit History]

Industry: [Industry]
Years in Business: [Years]

Assess:
1. Creditworthiness score
2. Debt service capacity
3. Collateral adequacy
4. Industry risk factors
5. NZ economic exposure
6. Recommendation with conditions

prompts.title: Board Financial Presentation
prompts.content:
Create a board-level financial presentation for [Company Name].

Reporting Period: [Period]
Audience: [Board/Executive Team]

Financial Highlights:
[Key Numbers]

Strategic Initiatives:
[List Initiatives]

Challenges:
[Current Challenges]

Market Position:
[Market Context]

Prepare a presentation covering:
1. Executive summary (one page)
2. Financial performance vs budget
3. KPI dashboard
4. Strategic progress update
5. Risk register highlights
6. Outlook and recommendations

Keep language board-appropriate and strategic.
